roleset.name: analyze into parts

example.name: from BOLT
example.text: So , anti-Zionists often become anti-Semites , rather than do the intellectual efforts *PRO* to parse the two concepts .

example.name: All args
example.text: So we've taken all of that content and we've parsed it into pieces that match certain issues.
example.arg: into pieces that match certain issues.
